title: To establish the High Performance Schools Program in the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.
content: High Performance Schools Act of 2001 - Establishes the High Performance Schools Program, in the Department of Energy, to assist school districts in the production of high performance elementary and secondary school buildings that are healthful, productive, energy efficient, and environmentally sound. Authorizes the Secretary of Energy to make program grants to State energy offices for: (1) program participation promotion and administration. And (2) subgrants to qualified school districts to implement such school building construction and renovation.
